description: Using the fresh ricotta I made with other items I had on hand.
keywords: Cheese pizza,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Homemade Ricotta on Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven. Mix the butter, oil and garlic together and spread all over the pizza base.
Top with mozzarella, diced tomato, crumbled ricotta. Sprinkle some sea salt over the top. Put in to the oven for 10 to 15 min.
Make basil oil. Pop basil and oil into a small mixer and blitz.
Take pizza out of the oven and drizzle the basil oil over the top. Slice and enjoy.
